get.summary: Get all categories for shops near user
get.description: Returns product categories for shops within a 2 km radius of the user's current location.

message.example: No categories found for shops within 3 km.

get.summary: Get all service categories for nearby shops
get.description: Returns service-based categories for shops within a 2 km radius of the user's current location.

message.example: No services found for shops within 3 km.

get.summary: Get all products based on current location
get.description: Returns a list of products grouped by category, available within a 2 km radius from the user's current location.

404.description: Products List Not Found in the radius

message.example: Products List Not Found in the radius.

post.summary: Get products by category ID, location, and sort options

message.example: No Products Found in the radius.

get.summary: Get all grouped products by category and subcategory within a specific radius
get.description: Returns grouped products filtered by category, subcategory, and sorted by options like price or discount.

parameters.name: category_id
parameters.description: ID of the category to filter products

parameters.name: subcategory_id
parameters.description: ID of the subcategory to filter products

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Sort by option (Relevance, Price(L-H), Price(H-L), discount)

post.description: Fetch detailed information of a product by its ID.

get.summary: Get advisements for shops within a 2 km radius
get.description: Returns advisements of shops near the provided latitude and longitude

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Radius in kilometers to search for nearby shops

message.example: No advisement found for shops within 2 km.

get.summary: Get banners for shops within a 2 km radius
get.description: Returns banners of shops near the provided latitude and longitude

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Radius in kilometers to search for nearby shops

message.example: No banner found for shops within 2 km.

get.summary: Search shops, categories, subcategories, and products within a radius
get.description: Search for shops, categories, subcategories, and products by query string and geographic location with radius filtering.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Radius in kilometers to filter nearby shops

distance.description: Distance from search point in kilometers

get.summary: Get nearby shops within a 2km radius
get.description: Returns a list of nearby shops based on the user's current latitude and longitude.

get.summary: Get all nearby shops within a 2km radius (no limit)
get.description: Returns all shops within a 2km radius based on the user's current location (latitude and longitude).

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Latitude of the user's current location

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Longitude of the user's current location

post.summary: Get all products by Shop ID within a radius
post.description: Returns a list of products from a shop if it's a product-based shop, or service details if it's a service-based shop.

404.description: Shop not found or no products found

message.example: No products found in the radius.

get.summary: Get weather data by latitude and longitude
get.description: Returns current weather data for the given geographic coordinates using OpenWeatherMap API.

data.description: Weather data object returned from OpenWeatherMap API

404.description: Weather data not found for provided coordinates

message.example: Weather Data Not Found For Provided Coordinates
